issue.title: [C++] Implement n-ary iterator for a collection of chunked arrays with possibly different chunking layouts
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3134](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3134). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is a common pattern that will result in kernel invocation on chunked arrays

comments.body:

Not n-ary, but we have `ApplyBinaryChunked` now.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3134?focusedCommentId=17079352) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
